name: Captain Greenbeard
text: Whenever you summon a minion within enemy territory, it gains Haste.

name: Elber, Jungle Emissary
text: When you play a card that costs 8 or more, heal for 4.

name: Executor Ginn
text: (2 Mana, Action) Destroy an ally minion and convert the tile it occupied to a village.

name: Jagris, the Huntsman
text: (1 Mana, Range 2, Cooldown 2) A minion gains +1/+1/+1.

name: Kai, Longcount Shaman
text: (Cooldown 25, Starts on Cooldown) An enemy commander gains "At the start of turn, take 5 Damage". When you cast a Spell, reduce cooldown by 1.

name: Soultaker Viessa
text: (2 Mana, Cooldown 3, Range 2) Deal 2 damage, gain 2 health.

name: Lazim, Thief of Gods
text: Your deck may contain cards from any god, but not neutral cards.

name: Lubela, Tender of the Wilds
text: (2 mana, cooldown 2): Increase Lubela's Dominion by 1.

name: Lyre, Tactician of the Order
text: (Cooldown 6) Summon a Lucian Soldier. Starts on cooldown. Whenever you summon a Minion, reduce the cooldown by 1.

name: Macks Speed
text: (1 Mana, Action, Self) Claim an unclaimed tile. (Can claim tiles not adjacent to your territory.)
